dialog: You're not too shabby either. I'm craving some steamed dragon claw, it's said to taste like a slice of heaven.
Let's head to the wizarding tavern and secure a table to order some grub.
Hold on a moment. I need to inform the wizard behind the seafood counter of our order.
Very well. I'll wait for you inside the tavern.
What do you say we try some deep-fried phoenix feathers?
Where are you headed off to?
I have an appointment at St. Mungo's Hospital for Magic Maladies and Injuries.
Hop in, I'll apparate us there.
How much will it cost for the trip?
It will cost ten Galleons.
By the way, what time is it?
You can check the time on your wizarding watch. I've got radio time.
It's a quarter to midnight. Could you please speed up the apparition?
Of course.
You've made a wise choice. This Chinese tea set from Jingdezhen is quite unique.
Where did it come from?
It was crafted in Jingdezhen, the Capital of Porcelain.
Jingdezhen? Isn't it known as the 'Capital of Porcelain'?
Indeed it is.
This is exactly what I've been envisioning.
